mapper.select: SELECT goods_id AS goodsId, lot_number AS lotNumber, product_date AS productDate, valid_date AS validDate, line_num AS lineNum, quantity AS receiveQuantity FROM saas_distr_in_return_out_shelf WHERE parent_id = #{enterpriseId} AND dtl_id = (select base_order_dtl_id from saas_distr_return_notice_detail where id = #{baseOrderDtlId}) ORDER BY line_num ASC

SELECT lot_number AS lotNumber, product_date AS productDate, valid_date AS validDate, receive_quantity AS receiveQuantity, sampling_quantity AS samplingQuantity, check_project_ids AS checkProjectIds, qualified_quantity AS qualifiedQuantity, conclusion_ids AS conclusionIds, test_report_ids AS testReportIds, unqualified_quantity AS unqualifiedQuantity, unqualified_reason_ids AS unqualifiedReasonIds, measures_ids AS measuresIds, remark FROM saas_distr_return_check_lot WHERE enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} AND check_id = #{id} AND dtl_id = #{dtlId}

SELECT dtl_id AS dtlId, lot_number AS lotNumber, product_date AS productDate, valid_date AS validDate, receive_quantity AS receiveQuantity, sampling_quantity AS samplingQuantity, check_project_ids AS checkProjectIds, qualified_quantity AS qualifiedQuantity, conclusion_ids AS conclusionIds, unqualified_quantity AS unqualifiedQuantity, unqualified_reason_ids AS unqualifiedReasonIds, measures_ids AS measuresIds, remark FROM saas_distr_return_check_lot WHERE enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} AND check_id = #{id}
